ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( RecordTypeId = 'Engagement_Attendee_Record_Type_Id', RecordTypeId = 'NCM_Attendee_Record_Type_Id' ), ISPICKVAL(Attendee_Type__c, "Guest"), ISBLANK(Associated_Attendee__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This validation rule will ensure that if an Engagement Attendee is of Type "Guest", it must be associated with another Attendee who is not a guest, and it must be null if the attendee is not a guest.
